SETUP: Set R0 = 1
0001 001 000 0 00 000	ADD	DR1	SR0	SR0		R1 = 1 + 1	= 2
0001 011 001 0 00 000	ADD	DR3	SR1	SR0		R3 = 2 + 1 	= 3
0001 100 011 0 00 001	ADD	DR4	SR3	SR1		R4 = 3 + 2	= 5
0001 010 100 0 00 011	ADD	DR2	SR4	SR3		R2 = 5 + 3	= 8
0001 010 010 0 00 100	ADD	DR2	SR2	SR4		R2 = 8 + 5	= 13	R2 = 0000000000001101
1001 010 010 111111		NOT	DR2	SR2			R2 = 1111111111110010
0101 010 010 0 00 011	AND	DR2	SR2	SR3		R2 = 0000000000000010
0001 010 010 1 00011	ADD	DR2	SR2	#3		R0 = 2 + 3	= 5		R2 = 0000000000000101
0101 010 100 1 01110	AND DR2 SR4 01110	R2 = 0000000000000100
